You are careful and considerate in everything you do.
You try your best to be caring and compassionate to everyone you meet.
Above all else, you're incredibly patient, and willing to listen to others before deciding what to do.
As a result, you're also quite meticulous about your work, and are careful not to make mistakes.
You'd rather take your time and get things right on the first try.
However, just as you're gentle toward others, you can sometimes be a bit emotionally vulnerable.
A gentle person like you will be...
